summary: The implementation addresses REQ-6 (chat history tabs), REQ-7 (video section fixes), REQ-8 (real-time market trends), and REQ-9 (exchange rate table display). However, REQ-10 (autonomous daily backend timer for exchange rates) is missing, and there are concerns about the actual implementation of real-time functionality.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement autonomous daily updates for exchange rate data by creating a backend timer that fetches and updates exchange rates every 24 hours. Store the update timestamp and ensure the system continues updating even after canister upgrades.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of a backend timer implementation for autonomous daily exchange rate updates. The backend shows exchange rate storage and mock URLs, but no timer setup, no timer persistence across upgrades, and no automatic 24-hour update mechanism.

missing_requirements.requirement: Charts update smoothly without jarring transitions
missing_requirements.reason: While real-time refetch intervals are configured, there is no evidence in the diff of smooth chart transition animations or transition configurations in the chart components.

hallucinated_features.description: Mock exchange rate URLs pointing to api.example.com which are non-functional placeholder endpoints
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend defines exchangeRateUrls with example.com endpoints that cannot fetch real data. This contradicts the autonomous update requirement and suggests incomplete implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Exchange rates initialized to 0.0 with no actual fetching mechanism
hallucinated_features.reason: All exchange rates are hardcoded to 0.0 and there is no implementation of the actual fetching logic from the defined URLs or any external source.
